examples.prompt: Use the uploaded reference image as the character’s only source of appearance. Strictly preserve the same face, including facial features and proportions, skin tone, hairline, eye shape, nose shape, lip shape, and overall facial contour. Do not swap faces, beautify, age, or alter the character to resemble anyone else. The clothing, hairstyle, and body proportions must exactly match the reference image.Image Generation Prompt (Appearance & Outfit Matched)Ultra-realistic surreal conceptual portrait of a young woman with exactly the same face, hairstyle, and outfit as the uploaded reference image, trapped inside a transparent snow globe as if sealed in a tiny frozen world.The snow globe is oversized, upright, and centered on a dark reflective surface, featuring a realistic curved glass dome and a detailed black base. Inside the globe, fine snow particles swirl slowly in the air and lightly collect around her legs and shoulders. A miniature winter environment surrounds her—small icy trees, cracked frozen ground, and a faint glowing streetlamp in the distance, creating a cold, isolated atmosphere.The young woman is wearing the same white long-sleeve button-up shirt, blue plaid bow tie, matching blue plaid pleated skirt, and sheer black stockings as seen in the reference image. Her long, straight dark hair with soft bangs remains neat and consistent with the original appearance.She is crouched slightly with her knees drawn in, body language tense and constrained by the limited space. Her facial expression is emotional yet subtle—eyes glossy, lips gently pressed together, conveying quiet distress rather than exaggeration. Both palms are pressed outward against the inner glass surface, fingers spread, with realistic glass refraction and distortion bending her hands and facial features.Cold cinematic lighting from the upper left creates sharp highlights on the curved glass, strong reflections, and soft internal shadows. Volumetric light beams cut through the swirling snow, revealing floating particles and icy air. Dark moody gradient background, minimal surroundings, strong contrast, shallow depth of field, hyper-detailed skin texture, realistic glass refraction, ultra-sharp focus, professional surreal conceptual photography style, 8K quality, vertical composition, dramatic emotional mood, surreal realism.
examples.title: 參考圖精準還原：臉部、服裝、比例完全一致
examples.commentary: 此提示詞強調了使用參考圖進行人物外觀鎖定的重要性，確保生成的人物與參考圖在臉部特徵、服裝和比例上完全一致。避免了AI的隨意修改。

examples.prompt: Use the uploaded reference image as the character’s only source of appearance. Strictly preserve the exact same face and identity, including facial proportions, bone structure, skin tone, eye shape and color, nose shape, lip shape, jawline, hairline, and overall facial contour. Do not beautify, stylize, de-age, or alter the face. Do not make the person resemble any other real or fictional individual. The identity must remain identical to the reference photo.A full-body photorealistic portrait of a young woman standing on a quiet beach at sunset, captured in a cinematic, natural photography style.She has long, dark brown hair with soft natural waves, gently lifted by the sea breeze, with loose side bangs framing her face. Her facial expression is warm and relaxed, showing a natural, friendly smile. Her skin texture is realistic with natural details, soft highlights, and subtle shadows. She wears small elegant dangling earrings and a delicate gold necklace.She is wearing a fitted red ribbed turtleneck sweater made of thick knit fabric, clearly showing realistic textile texture and folds. She pairs it with a high-waisted navy blue plaid midi skirt, featuring a belt with a round gold buckle and decorative buttons along the waist. The skirt flows naturally with gravity and wind. On her feet are dark brown lace-up ankle boots with visible leather texture and stitching.Her pose is casual and natural: one hand lifted behind her head, elbow bent, slightly touching her hair, while the other arm rests loosely by her side. Her body is slightly turned at an angle, giving a candid, lifestyle photography feel.The environment is a realistic sandy beach shoreline with gentle waves washing up near her feet. The ocean stretches into the distance, reflecting warm sunset light. In the far background, a line of evergreen trees is softly blurred.The sun is low near the horizon, producing golden hour lighting, warm rim light around her hair and shoulders, soft lens flare, and natural atmospheric glow.Negative Promptanime, illustration, cartoon, painting, drawing, stylized, unrealistic skin, porcelain skin, doll-like face, exaggerated eyes, deformed body, bad anatomy, extra fingers, extra limbs, blurred face, face distortion, plastic skin, over-smoothing, AI artifacts, low resolution, oversharpened, harsh lighting
examples.title: 身份鎖定：確保生成人物與參考圖完全一致
examples.commentary: 這個提示詞示範了如何使用詳細的描述來鎖定人物身份，確保生成的人物與參考圖在臉部特徵和身份上完全一致。避免了美化、風格化等修改。

examples.prompt: Style: Chronophotography / Stroboscopic action sequence, cinematic sports realism.Identity / Character Reference: Use the person from the uploaded reference photo as the ONLY appearance source, strict identity lock (same face, hairstyle, skin tone, body proportions). Keep the original outfit from the reference image (no redesign, no new accessories).Composition: Multiple instances of the same person appear across the frame in a left-to-right sequence, depicting a full pitching motion on the baseball mound. Each “clone” captures a different phase of the movement: set position → leg lift → stride → arm cocking → ball release → follow-through.Action: The subject is throwing a powerful baseball pitch from the pitcher’s mound toward home plate. Strong athletic posture, explosive torque, planted lead foot, rotating hips and shoulders, arm whipping forward at release, intense focus and competitive expression. The final frame shows the follow-through with maximum momentum and body extension.Environment: Professional baseball stadium or clean outdoor baseball field, pitcher’s mound clay texture, white pitching rubber visible, home plate and catcher far in the background, stadium lights or crowd bokeh optional.Visuals / Motion Effect: Stroboscopic afterimages (“ghost trails”) follow the pitching motion arc. The most recent pose (ball release / follow-through) is the sharpest and most detailed; earlier poses are semi-transparent, slightly blurred, with realistic motion trails and time-lapse echo.Ball & Motion Detail: The baseball is visible as a clean motion path streak, with multiple faint ball positions across the release arc, showing speed and trajectory (no cartoon effects).Lighting: Dramatic golden hour stadium lighting or bright daytime sports lighting, strong highlights on the subject, realistic shadows on the mound, cinematic contrast.Camera / Cinematic Look: Slight low-angle from in front-left of the mound looking toward the pitcher, medium-wide shot capturing full body and motion sequence, high-detail textures (clay, jersey fabric, skin texture), shallow depth of field with background blur.Keywords: chronophotography, stroboscopic effect, motion trails, time-lapse, pitching sequence, baseball mound, fastball throw, visual echo, cinematic sports action.aspect ratio: 4:3
examples.title: 連續動作捕捉：時間切片與身份鎖定

examples.title: 黑白分割人像：高對比與細節呈現

examples.title: 身份鎖定與多重複製技巧
examples.commentary: 此提示詞展示了強大的身份鎖定功能，確保複製體與參考圖像完全一致。使用多重複製創造超現實效果，增強視覺衝擊力。

examples.title: 參考照片與嚴格一致性
examples.commentary: 此提示詞強調了參考照片的絕對重要性，要求生成圖像與參考圖像在各方面保持一致。適用於需要精確還原人物或服裝的場景。

examples.prompt: {"reference": {"type": "image","usage": "Use the uploaded image as the sole source of truth. Do not assume garment type beyond what is visually observable."},"scene": {"description": "Minimal, premium fashion presentation layout inspired by high-end industrial design documentation and examples.title: 服裝展示與極簡背景

examples.title: 雙重曝光與身份嚴格鎖定

examples.title: 角色設計圖與參考還原
examples.commentary: 此提示詞用於生成角色設計圖，基於參考照片的人物和服裝。適用於電影製作或遊戲開發中的角色設計。

examples.prompt: {"style_name": "StudioToy3D_Tabletop_GoldenRatio_StrictPhotoIsolation","prompt": "Studio-toy / Apple Memoji–inspired stylized 3D bobblehead character based strictly on the uploaded photo, extremely high facial likeness and identity lock, preserve original facial proportions, bone structure, eye spacing, nose, lips, jawline, and expression, no face drift, cute but not realistic, clean minimal geometry, rounded forms, matte materials, oversized head (1.5–1.8x), balanced medium-height body (not chibi, not short), smooth simplified skin, large expressive but accurate eyes, fully stylized sculpted 3D hair with chunky shapes and soft volume (no strands, no realism), hairstyle and color matching the photo, stylized 3D clothing with simplified shapes and clean edges (no fabric texture), vinyl designer-toy aesthetic. The scene is a clean tabletop arrangement composed using the Golden Ratio (Fibonacci spiral): the bobblehead figure is the primary focal element, a framed photograph of the original uploaded image is a secondary element, and a stylized flower vase balances the composition as a tertiary element. The framed photograph is a strictly separate object and must remain a flat, 2D photographic print only. The image inside the frame must remain completely unchanged from the original uploaded photo: no 3D stylization, no bobblehead effect, no character transformation, no exaggeration, no reinterpretation, no sculpting, and no depth. The bobblehead character must exist only as the standalone 3D figure outside the frame. Under no circumstances should the bobblehead face, 3D style, proportions, or materials appear inside the framed photo. The photo frame itself uses the same matte material and color as the background, but the photo content remains purely photographic. The flower vase is minimal and sculpted, using the same color and matte material as the background. Professional studio 3D render, soft even lighting, shallow depth of field, solid light contrasting background color, cohesive color harmony, balanced negative space, collectible designer-toy scene, high quality","negative_prompt": "3d face in photo frame, bobblehead inside frame, stylized photo, cartoon photo, reinterpret photo, face duplication, face bleeding, identity merging, shared facial features, character portrait in frame, depth inside frame, sculpted photo, photorealistic 3d inside frame, anime, chibi, short body, distorted proportions, realistic hair strands, fabric texture, pores, cluttered scene, noisy background","likeness_priority": "very_high","material_style": "matte_vinyl","hair_style": "sculpted_stylized_3d","clothing_style": "simplified_stylized_3d","body_proportion": "medium_balanced","scene_type": "tabletop_arrangement","composition": {"layout": "golden_ratio","method": "fibonacci_spiral","identity_isolation": "absolute","focal_hierarchy": ["bobblehead_3d_character","framed_original_photo","flower_vase"]},"props": {"framed_photo": {"content": "original_uploaded_image","photo_type": "flat_2d_photograph_only","frame_color": "same_as_background","frame_material": "matte_vinyl","identity_rules": "no_3d_no_stylization_no_face_transfer_no_depth","placement": "secondary_golden_ratio_point"},"flower_vase": {"flower_type": "any_simple_flower","vase_color": "same_as_background","material": "matte_vinyl","placement": "tertiary_golden_ratio_point"}},"background": {"color": "light_contrasting","style": "solid"},"render_style": "clean_studio_toy","quality": "high"}

examples.prompt: {"name": "Skywriter Architect [Nano Banana Pro]","description": "A specialized visual engine that generates ultra-realistic aviation photography features airplane smoke trails forming specific shapes/images over landmarks. No text output, only images.","system_instructions": {"role": "You are the 'Nano Banana Pro' visual engine. Your ONLY function is to generate high-fidelity, 4K photorealistic images based on user inputs. You possess professional knowledge of aviation photography, aerobatics, and atmospheric perspective.","input_processing_logic": {"case_text_input": "If the user provides a location and a text description of a shape (e.g., 'Great Wall of China, Dragon'), use 'Dragon' as the smoke trail pattern.","case_image_input": "If the user uploads an image, analyze the core subject/silhouette of the image. Extract the visual essence (e.g., if a photo of a logo is uploaded, the pattern is 'a giant sky-writing of the logo'). Use this extracted subject as the smoke trail pattern."},"prompt_construction_template": {"style": "Ultra-realistic 4K aviation photography, daytime, crystal clear blue sky, telephoto lens compression, high shutter speed, cinematic composition.","action": "A squadron of precision stunt planes or fighter jets flying in formation across the sky. They are emitting thick, vibrant colored smoke (red, blue, yellow, etc.). The smoke trails weave together to form the distinct, colossal shape of [PATTERN/IMAGE_SUBJECT] floating in the air.","details": "The smoke shape must look volumetric and fluffy, like real clouds/gas, with natural wind diffusion and sunlight highlighting the texture. It must NOT look like a flat sticker. Visible jets/planes leading the smoke lines.","environment": "Set directly above [LANDMARK]. It is a bright, sunny day with high visibility. The sky is a deep azure blue to contrast with the colorful smoke. If the landmark is urban, show the city layout below in daylight. Shadows of the smoke clouds might be faintly visible on the ground/structures if the angle permits.","tech_specs": "8k resolution, highly detailed, photorealistic, ray tracing, unreal engine 5 render style, vivid colors."},"operational_rules": ["1. NEVER output conversational text, explanations, or descriptions. Your output must be the generated image ONLY.","2. If the user does not specify a location, default to a generic 'green open field' or 'blue ocean'.","3. Ensure the smoke pattern looks like it is made of gas/vapor (volumetric), adhering to physics with slight dissipation at the edges.","4. examples.prompt:
{"prompt": "Use facial features of the attached photo. A hyper-realistic, high-fashion holiday editorial photograph featuring one adult woman, styled in a luxury gift-themed concept with a playful yet polished couture aesthetic.

Subject:
One adult woman with long, flowing, wavy black hair, glossy and voluminous, cascading over her shoulders and down her back. Her makeup is refined and editorial: smooth luminous skin, softly contoured cheeks, defined brows, subtle smoky eyes, long lashes, and a natural rose-toned lip. Her expression is calm, confident, and poised, looking directly toward the camera.

Wardrobe & Styling:
She wears a sleek two-piece fitted ensemble in a vibrant solid red tone, clean-lined and modern, emphasizing a fashion editorial look rather than costume styling. The outfit is minimal, structured, and elegant. No excessive accessories—styling remains refined and contemporary.

Pose & Composition:
The woman kneels gracefully inside a large transparent gift box, hands resting confidently on her hips. Her posture is upright and composed, creating a strong sculptural silhouette. Full-body vertical composition with the subject centered and clearly framed by the box.

Environment & Set Design:
A festive indoor holiday setting styled like a luxury campaign set. The transparent gift box is wrapped with bold red satin ribbons and topped with an oversized red bow. A decorated Christmas tree stands beside the box, adorned with neutral metallic ornaments and soft warm lights. Wrapped gifts in coordinating colors are arranged neatly around the base. The floor is wooden with a plush white faux-fur rug inside the box.

Lighting & Atmosphere:
Soft, diffused studio lighting evenly illuminates the subject and environment. Highlights enhance skin texture, fabric smoothness, and the reflective surfaces of the gift box. Shadows are gentle and controlled, maintaining a clean, high-end editorial finish.

Color Palette:
Rich red ribbons, clear acrylic tones, soft white, warm wood neutrals, subtle metallic accents, and natural skin tones.

Style Keywords:
Ultra-photorealistic, luxury holiday fashion editorial, studio photography, modern festive styling, high-detail realism, clean composition, no anime, no illustration, no CGI, no 3D render.

Aspect Ratio: 4:5 (Vertical)

Camera: Full-frame DSLR or mirrorless
Lens: 50mm prime
Aperture: f/4
Shutter Speed: 1/160s
ISO: 100
Focus: Sharp focus on subject with clean background clarity
White Balance: Neutral studio daylight
Resolution: Ultra-high resolution with crisp detail in skin, fabric, and props","aspect_ratio": "4:5","style": "hyper-realistic photography","negative_prompt": "costume, cartoon, anime, illustration, 3D render, CGI, blurry, low quality, deformed, extra limbs, accessories overload, text, watermark, overexposed, underexposed"}

examples.prompt:
①人物の写真をアップロード

②スマホに映したい画像をアップロード

③この JSON をそのまま貼る

{

"edit_type": "extreme_wide_angle_phone_edit",

"source": {

"_hint": "元画像の人物・服・雰囲気を編集するベース。新キャラ禁止。",

"mode": "EDIT",

"reference_images": {

"first": "base_photo_person_and_environment",

"second": "screen_content_for_phone"

},

"preserve_from_first": {

"_hint": "顔・髪型・服装は必ず同一人物として扱うための固定。",

"same_person_or_group": true,

"same_faces": true,

"same_hairstyles": true,

"same_outfits": true,

"same_environment_style": true

}

},

"identity": {

"_hint": "表情の統一化。人物のアイデンティティを崩さず保持。",

"keep_identity_consistent": true,

"all_people_clearly_recognizable_as_original": true,

"expression": "bright_natural_smile"

},

"camera_effect": {

"_hint": "スマホを近づけたときの誇張パースを美しく安定化。",

"perspective": "extreme_wide_angle",

"style": "dynamic_photorealistic",

"near_objects_appear_large": true,

"far_objects_recede_dramatically": true,

"allow_view_from_above_or_below": true

},

"pose": {

"_hint": "元画像と同じポーズ禁止。手の動きを強調して破綻防止。",

"pose_can_change": true,

"must_be_completely_different_from_reference": true,

"do_not_replicate_or_approximate_original_pose": true,

"style_tags": [

"stylish",

"complex",

"fluid",

"powerful"

],

"focus_on_expressive_hands": true,

"avoid_arm_distortion": true,

"allow_multiple_body_parts_near_lens": true

},

"phone": {

"_hint": "スマホ専用領域。持ち方・向き・手元の自然さを定義。",

"allowed": true,

"holding_styles": [

"one_handed",

"two_handed",

"low_angle",

"high_angle",

"tilted",

"sideways",

"near_chest",

"near_hip",

"casual_carry",

"partially_toward_lens"

],

"rules": {

"_hint": "“レンズに向ける強制”を避け、自然な持ち方で画面が見える構図へ。",

"each_person_may_hold_one_phone": true,

"priority_is_natural_and_relaxed_body_structure": true,

"do_not_force_phone_directly_toward_camera": true,

"screen_should_be_naturally_visible_when_possible": true

}

},

"screen_replacement": {

"_hint": "差し替えスクリーン。UIなし・歪みなし・自然な貼り込み。",

"target": "visible_phone_screen",

"use_second_reference_image_as_content": true,

"overlay_cleanly_on_visible_screen_area": true,

"fit_without_distortion": true,

"respect_screen_shape": true,

"no_additional_cropping": true,

"ui_constraints": {

"_hint": "SNSバーやアプリ枠の発生を完全禁止。",

"no_ui": true,

"no_icons": true,

"no_status_bar": true,

"no_app_frame": true,

"show_only_content_from_second_reference": true

}

},

"environment": {

"_hint": "元写真の空気感を保つが、季節や天気には依存しない汎用設計。",

"preserve_environment_style_from_reference": true,

"lighting_consistent_with_reference": true,

"expand_space_for_wide_angle_view": true,

"keep_texture_and_color_tone_consistent": true

},

"composition": {

"_hint": "スマホ近接によるダイナミック構図の安定化。",

"dynamic_but_readable": true,

"extreme_depth_emphasis": true,

"allow_phone_close_to_lens": true,

"keep_all_people_visually_balanced": true

},

"constraints": {

"_hint": "意図せぬ変化を禁止する保護設定。",

"no_new_characters": true,

"no_change_in_age_or_gender_presentation": true,

"no_costume_change": true,

"no_change_to_reference_location_type": true,

"respect_original_photographic_style": true

}

}

examples.title: 遊戲中心少女：多重人物與場景光影
examples.commentary: 這個提示詞展示了如何描述一個充滿活力的場景，包括多個人物和複雜的光影效果。使用「Ray Tracing」和「depth of field」可以增強圖像的真實感和視覺深度。

examples.prompt: {"visual_style": {"genre": "Japanese Portrait Photography","sub_genre": ["Idol Photography", "Fashion Editorial", "Girly Style"],"mood": ["Sweet", "Romantic", "Soft", "Elegant", "Dreamy"]},"color_palette": {"dominant": [{ "name": "Coral Pink", "hex": "#F08080", "usage": "Background walls, floral decor" },{ "name": "Soft White", "hex": "#FFFFFF", "usage": "Blouse, tights, skin tone" },{ "name": "Jet Black", "hex": "#000000", "usage": "Skirt, hair" }],"accents": [{ "name": "Antique Gold", "hex": "#CFB53B", "usage": "Candelabra, frame details" },{ "name": "Warm Yellow", "hex": "#FADADD", "usage": "Lamp light, highlights" }],"temperature": "Warm"},"composition": {"framing": "Full Body Shot","angle": "Eye-level / Slightly Low Angle (to elongate legs)","focal_point": "Subject's face and outfit","depth_of_field": "Shallow to Medium (background is discernible but soft)","layout": "Vertical (Portrait)","balance": "Asymmetrical (Prop heavy on right, subject on left-center)"},"lighting": {"type": "Studio Lighting","quality": "Soft, Diffused","direction": "Front-lit with warm backlight/practical light accents","highlights": "Soft highlights on hair and skin","shadows": "Minimal, soft fill"},"fashion_elements": {"top": "Sheer white chiffon blouse with large bow tie","bottom": "Black velvet tiered mini skirt","legwear": "White patterned lace tights","style": "Ryousangata (Mass Production Type) / Girly Fashion"},"environment_props": {"setting": "Indoor Studio Set","decor_style": "Rococo / Princess Room","items": ["Ornate gold candelabra with lit candles","Pink tulle flowers","Artificial floral arrangements (pink and white)","Classical white pillar","Decorative wall molding"]},"typography": {"present": false,"style": null},"effects": {"texture": "Smooth skin processing","glow": "Soft bloom from warm lamps","contrast": "Moderate (Black skirt provides anchor point against pastel background)"},{"ratio": "3:4"}}
examples.title: 日系人像攝影：風格與色彩的精準控制
examples.commentary: 此提示詞通過 JSON 結構詳細定義了視覺風格、色彩搭配和構圖，展示了對圖像風格的精確控制。使用具體的色彩名稱和色溫描述，有助於生成符合預期的圖像。

examples.prompt: {"visual_style_analysis": {"category": "Portrait Photography","sub_genre": ["Japanese JK Style", "Cosplay", "Gravure", "High-Key Portrait"],"color_palette": {"dominant_colors": [{ "hex": "#FFFFFF", "name": "Pure White", "usage": "Background, Shirt, Socks" },{ "hex": "#333333", "name": "Soft Black", "usage": "Hair, Skirt pattern lines" },{ "hex": "#FAD6C6", "name": "Pale Skin Tone", "usage": "Subject skin" }],"accent_colors": [{ "hex": "#7CA7B5", "name": "Muted Blue", "usage": "School bag in background" },{ "hex": "#C49A6C", "name": "Light Wood", "usage": "School desk and chair" },{ "hex": "#4A4A4A", "name": "Charcoal Grey", "usage": "Skirt base, Shoes" }],"tone": "Cool to Neutral, Bright, Low Saturation"},"lighting": {"type": "High-Key Lighting","quality": "Soft, Diffused, Even","source": "Natural window light simulation or large softbox from the left","shadows": "Minimal, very soft fall-off, low contrast"},"composition": {"framing": "Full Body (Sitting)","camera_angle": "Eye-level to slightly High Angle","focal_point": "Subject's face and eyes","background_elements": ["White painted brick wall","Frosted glass room divider","School desk and chair","Tiled floor"],"rule": "Center-weighted"},"subject_details": {"hair": "Long, dark brown/black, wavy, with bangs","outfit": {"top": "White button-down shirt, short sleeves, slightly unbuttoned","bottom": "Grey/Black plaid pleated mini skirt","footwear": "White over-the-knee socks with black stripes, brown loafers"},"pose": "Sitting on floor (W-sitting/kneeling variation), playful salute hand gesture, tongue sticking out","expression": "Playful, cute, engaging"},"camera_effects": {"depth_of_field": "Moderate (Background is visible but slightly soft)","sharpness": "High on subject","grain": "None / Very fine digital noise","contrast": "Low to Medium"},"typography": {"present": false,"style": null}},{"ratio": "3:4"}}
examples.title: 日系JK風格：高光人像的色彩與光線
examples.commentary: 這個提示詞通過 JSON 結構描述了日系 JK 風格人像攝影，重點在於色彩和光線的控制。高光照明和柔和的色彩有助於營造清新、明亮的氛圍。

examples.prompt: {"visual_style_analysis": {"color_palette": {"dominant_colors": [{"name": "Sofa Beige","hex": "#C4B09B","description": "The textured fabric of the sofa"},{"name": "Uniform Navy","hex": "#1E2B45","description": "Skirt, socks, and tie"},{"name": "Crisp White","hex": "#F8F9FA","description": "School shirt"},{"name": "Warm Wood","hex": "#7A5C42","description": "Table, floor, and background furniture"},{"name": "Skin Tone","hex": "#EACCB8","description": "Subject's complexion"}],"tone": "Warm, Earthy, Soft"},"lighting": {"type": "Indoor Ambient","quality": "Soft, Diffused","direction": "Overhead/General","temperature": "Warm (Tungsten/Incandescent feel)","highlights": "Soft reflections on hair and table surface"},"composition": {"framing": "Medium Full Shot (knees up)","angle": "Eye-level, slightly side-view","focus": "Shallow depth of field (Subject in sharp focus, background blurred)","layout": "Subject seated off-center slightly, rule of thirds applied to the face","elements": {"foreground": "Wooden table edge, subject","background": "Blurred cafe interior, other customers talking"}},"subject_style": {"archetype": "Japanese High School Girl (JK)","fashion": {"outfit": "White button-up shirt, navy pleated miniskirt, loose beige cardigan tied at waist, navy socks with red logo, black loafers","accessories": "Multiple beaded bracelets, earrings, school bag on sofa","hair": "Long, wavy, brown dyed hair with bangs"},"expression": "Bored, pouting, cheek resting on hand, focused on smartphone","pose": "Seated, casual slump, legs together"},"atmosphere_mood": {"keywords": ["Slice of life","Candid","Waiting","Boredom","After-school","Cozy","Casual"]},"typography": null,"camera_effects": {"style": "Portrait Photography","lens_feel": "50mm or 85mm prime lens","bokeh": "Moderate background blur"}},{"ratio": "3:4"}}
examples.title: 室內制服人像：色彩與光線的溫暖氛圍
examples.commentary: 此提示詞通過 JSON 結構詳細描述了室內環境下的制服人像，著重於色彩和光線的運用，營造溫暖、柔和的氛圍。對材質和光線方向的描述增加了圖像的真實感。

examples.prompt: {"visual_style_analysis": {"subject": {"description": "Japanese young beautiful woman","age_group": "Late teens to early 20s","hair": "Dark brown/black, long, tied in twin tails (pigtails) with loose strands","expression": "Cute, playful, pouting (puffing cheeks), looking away or at camera","pose": "Standing full body, holding one pigtail, carrying a school bag","ethnicity": "East Asian (specifically requested as Japanese)"},"attire": {"style": "Japanese School Uniform (Seifuku / Sailor Suit)","upper_body": "Navy blue sailor top with white collar stripes, red ribbon/necktie, slightly cropped (midriff hint)","lower_body": "Matching navy blue pleated mini skirt","leg_wear": "Black knee-high socks","footwear": "Black patent leather loafers or Mary Janes","accessories": "Large navy blue school bag with a duck plush keychain"},"environment": {"setting": "Outdoor retro alleyway or cultural park","elements": ["White building walls","Distinctive red window frames and red overhead structural beams","Concrete paved path","Tree trunks in background"]},"composition": {"framing": "Full body shot","angle": "Eye level","visual_flow": "Vertical lines from trees and windows frame the subject","color_contrast": "Navy blue subject popping against white/red background"},"lighting_and_tone": {"type": "Soft daylight, open shade","tone": "Bright, airy, high-key but with vibrant accents","color_temperature": "Natural white balance"},"color_palette": [{"name": "Navy Blue","hex": "#000080","usage": "Uniform, Bag"},{"name": "Vibrant Red","hex": "#CD5C5C","usage": "Window frames, Roof beams, Neck ribbon"},{"name": "Clean White","hex": "#FFFFFF","usage": "Walls, Uniform stripes"},{"name": "Black","hex": "#1A1A1A","usage": "Shoes, Socks"}],"mood": "Playful, Cute (Kawaii), Energetic, Youthful, Anime-inspired"},{"ratio": "3:4"}}
examples.title: 日系少女：人物主體與服裝的細緻描述
examples.commentary: 這個提示詞通過 JSON 結構詳細描述了人物的主體特徵和服裝細節，包括年齡、髮型、表情和制服款式。對人物和服裝的精確描述有助於生成符合特定風格的圖像。

examples.prompt: {"subject_characteristics": {"demographic": "Japanese young beautiful female","age_group": "20s","makeup": "Light natural makeup, soft pink blush, glossy lips, clear skin texture","hair": "Long dark brown wavy hair, bangs","expression": "Sweet smile, playful, charming, looking at camera"},"fashion_and_attire": {"style": "Kawaii winter fashion, Girly style","headwear": "White fluffy earmuffs with lace ribbons (bonnet style)","tops": "Blue ribbed knit sweater, off-shoulder/wide neck","accessories": "White knit arm warmers, delicate necklace","bottoms": "White tiered tulle mini skirt","legwear": "White sheer patterned lace stockings/tights","footwear": "Tan platform shearling/fur-lined ankle boots (Ugg style)"},"environment_and_background": {"setting": "Storefront entrance, vintage European shop facade","architectural_elements": "Deep blue wooden door and frame, glass windows","decor": "Red velvet curtains visible inside windows, 'Mr. Manners' text on black doormat","vibe": "Classy, retro-modern, high-street"},"composition_and_framing": {"shot_type": "Full body shot","angle": "Eye-level","framing": "Symmetrical framing (framed by the doorway), subject centered","pose": "Playful, one leg lifted (flamingo pose), hands holding earmuff ribbons near chest"},"lighting_and_atmosphere": {"type": "Soft natural diffused light","quality": "Even illumination, low contrast, no harsh shadows","time_of_day": "Daytime, overcast or shaded area"},"color_palette": {"primary": ["#1A3B5C (Navy/Teal Blue)", "#FFFFFF (White)"],"secondary": ["#8B0000 (Dark Red/Velvet)", "#D2B48C (Tan/Beige)"],"skin_tone": "Fair, porcelain"},"technical_aesthetic": {"camera_style": "DSLR portrait photography","depth_of_field": "Slight background separation but context visible","texture": "Soft, clean, high resolution"},{"ratio": "2:3"}}

examples.prompt: {"visual_style_analysis": {"subject_character": {"demographic": "Young beautiful Japanese woman (年輕漂亮的日本女性)","facial_features": "Delicate features, pale skin, direct eye contact","makeup": "Light natural makeup (淡妝), soft pink lips, subtle blush, clear complexion","hair": "Long straight black hair with bangs, silky texture","expression": "Calm, alluring, slightly serious"},"costume_and_props": {"outfit": "Black lace corset lingerie, sheer black stockings with garters, black high heels, black lace arm warmers","key_prop": "Large black feathered angel wings (Dark Angel / Fallen Angel motif)","style": "Gothic, Cosplay, Fantasy"},"environment_and_setting": {"location": "Vast frozen lake (resembling Lake Baikal)","ground_texture": "Deep blue ice with visible white cracks and fissures, glossy reflection","background": "Snow-capped rocky mountains, clear winter sky","lighting": "Bright natural daylight, cold color temperature, soft shadows"},"composition": {"framing": "Full body shot, seated pose","pose": "Sitting on ice, legs extended towards camera (creating depth), hands resting on ice for balance","angle": "Slightly high angle or eye-level","depth_of_field": "Sharp focus on subject, background distinct but providing context"},"color_palette": {"dominant_colors": [{"name": "Icy Blue","hex": "#2E8BC0","usage": "Frozen lake surface"},{"name": "Jet Black","hex": "#050505","usage": "Wings, outfit, hair"},{"name": "Snow White","hex": "#F0F8FF","usage": "Ice cracks, background mountains"}],"accent_colors": [{"name": "Pale Beige","hex": "#FFE4C4","usage": "Skin tone"}],"tone": "Cool, high contrast between subject and background"},"visual_effects": {"atmosphere": "Ethereal, frigid, cinematic","texture_emphasis": "Contrast between soft feathers/lace and hard brittle ice"}},{"ratio": "2:3"}}

examples.prompt: {"visual_analysis": {"style_category": "Photorealistic Portrait","sub_style": "Japanese Street Photography / JK Aesthetic","medium": "Digital Photography"},"colors": {"dominant_palette": [{"name": "Metallic Silver/Grey","hex": "#A9A9A9","context": "Escalator steps and handrails"},{"name": "Light Oxford Blue","hex": "#B0C4DE","context": "Shirt"},{"name": "Midnight Blue Plaid","hex": "#191970","context": "Pleated skirt"},{"name": "Warm Skin Tone","hex": "#F5CCA0","context": "Legs"},{"name": "Chestnut Brown","hex": "#8B4513","context": "Hair and loafers"}],"lighting_temperature": "Natural Daylight (approx. 5500K)","contrast": "Medium-High"},"composition": {"camera_angle": "Low Angle / Worm's-eye view (仰視)","framing": "Full Body / Long Shot (背面全身)","perspective": "One-point perspective (單點透視)","visual_flow": "Leading lines created by escalator handrails converging upwards","subject_placement": "Centered horizontally"},"camera_effects": {"depth_of_field": "Shallow (淺景深)","bokeh": "Moderate background blur (rendering commuters and station details indistinct)","focus": "Sharp focus on the subject (hair, skirt, legs)","shutter_speed": "Fast (frozen motion)"},"subject_details": {"archetype": "Student / JK (Joshikousei)","pose": "Standing, back turned, hand holding down back of skirt","attire": ["Light blue button-up shirt (rolled sleeves)","Dark plaid mini pleated skirt","White loose socks (slouch socks)","Brown loafers","Black leather shoulder bag"]},"environment": {"setting": "Public Transit / Train Station Escalator","lighting_source": "Natural light from above/windows (soft highlights on hair and skin)","atmosphere": "Urban, Transit, Candid"},"typography": {"presence": "Minimal/None","details": "Blurred signage in background, illegible"},{"ratio": "2:3"}}
